unnormalised: Hey, did you guys see that article about genetic testing in India? My neighbour, Mrs. Sharma, was telling me her family went for it. Apparently, she’s got a family history of DM, and wanted to check their risk. Cost her ₹15000 at Metropolis, I think. They found out her son, Rohan, has a 25% chance of getting it later in life. Scary stuff, no?
normalised: Hey, did you guys see that article about genetic testing in India? My neighbor, Missus Sharma, was telling me her family went for it. Apparently, she's got a family history of D-M, and wanted to check their risk. Cost her rupee fifteen thousand at Metropolis, I think. They found out her son, Rohan, has a twenty five percent chance of getting it later in life. Scary stuff, no?
